p: Mining of transcriptome data showed the presence of 21 novel MAPK genes. The identified transcripts were mapped on the Triticum aestivum genome sequence available on Ensemble Plants ( https://plants.ensembl.org/) for predicting the full length gene sequence. The predicted sequences were used for designing the forward and reverse oligo’s using Genefisher2 primer designing software (Table S2). Reverse Transcriptase PCR (RT-PCR) and cloning were performed as mentioned in Kumar et al. [ 21]. Sanger’s Di-deoxy method was used for the sequencing and further, the sequence of the genes were submitted in NCBI GenBank.
